name: Imp Blaster
description: Shoot the imps with the opposite element to kill them , shoot them with the same to duplicate them - use this technique to get as many points as possible.  I built this game in between other projects and made all the assets besides the music and far background myself. Unfortunately I lost all the files for this game when formatting my old PC so I am unable to update the game or find the sources to credit the music and background.  .....there was a PC build buuuuuut again that was lost in the great formatting.
